summary.span: 提供類別，這些類別支援在單一容器內儲存多個資料物件。

span.span: Provides classes that support storage of multiple data objects in a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象類別，可用來將物件組織在單一實體的定義實體，可攜性和高效率的存取。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 檔案是主要實體格式。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他實作可能使用其他實體的格式，例如 XML 文件時，資料庫，或 Web 服務。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 項目包含在檔案系統，例如在階層式組織中的資料夾與檔案參考。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 雖然是抽象類別，衍生的類別做為預設的 方法。Although is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. A （「 組件 」） 是抽象類別，代表儲存在物件。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . A （「 關聯性 」） 會定義來源之間的關聯或和目標物件。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. A可以是下列其中一種，每一個都可以有兩種形式：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 封裝層級關聯性 (由)Package-level relationship (created by ) - 之間和目標組件在封裝中的。Between a and a target part in the package. - 之間和封裝外部的目標資源。Between a and a target resource outside the package. - 組件層級關聯性 (由)Part-level relationship (created by ) - 來源和封裝中的另一個目標組件。Between a source and another target part in the package. - 來源和封裝外部的目標資源。Between a source and a target resource outside the package. 關聯性的來源或來源會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源物件時，會一併刪除來源物件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際變更以任何方式的來源或目標物件。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. A （「 數位簽章 」） 是組件和關係代表隨附的數位簽章的組合。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 數位簽章識別建立者，並驗證已簽署組件和關聯性包含在尚未經過修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 封裝也支援數位版權管理 (DRM) 可讓內容中的項目加密與特定存取權限授與授權的使用者。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM), which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 根據架構中，是設計用來儲存文件開啟為基礎的封裝類型[XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). Windows Presentation Foundation 會使用套件來儲存內容、 資源和網頁和依預設使用標準的 ZIP 檔案的文件的關聯性。Windows Presentation Foundation uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 可以使用任何 ZIP 檔案中，您的應用程式類別來儲存並選擇性地保護任何類型或單一的有效存取容器中的資料檔案數目。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格，可供下載的 XPS 區段[Windows 硬體開發人員中心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification, available for download at the XPS section of [Windows Hardware Developer Central](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
